resources.string: Step 1 : Choose the distro you want to install, you can install multiple disto without conflict.
WARNING: Only run this command inside the Linux System and not in Termux, otherwise it will not work!!!\n\nStep 1 : Please choose a distro to setup the GUI
Please press again to exit application

LinuxOnAndroid is a project intent to bring the access of Linux to Android platform.

The icon of this application is taken from https://www.iconfinder.com , which is created by user : "Alpár-Etele Méder", you can reach the icon author by clicking "ICON AUTHOR" button below.

Thanks for using this apps.


Regards, EXA Lab
